name: Draft01
description:
Made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 100 following the theme "chaos".

Find the yellow jewel, every time hidden deeper, while dodging bombs.

W - A - D to move.

The jewel emits lights from time to time to hint you where it is.

If you get hit,  it's game over. If you fall out from the screen, the game is over. The game will get darker and darker the more down you get and the more you advance in level.

There's numbered floors that take some damage before they are destroyed.
